LocaleConfig Class Reference

Detailed Description

Allows accessing the configuration for locale settings. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

Member Function Documentation

static INT LocaleConfig::GetLanguageCount (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Number of available languages.

static INT LocaleConfig::GetLanguageId (  const WCHAR *  iso2_code  )  [static]
 

Returns:
APOXI system languages identifier. It is recommended that the applications work with the LanguageManager::LanguageType instead of language IDs (see LocaleConfig::GetLanguageType(), LanguageManager::SetActiveLanguageType() and LanguageManager::GetActiveLanguageType()).

static LanguageManager::LanguageType LocaleConfig::GetLanguageType (  INT  lang_id  )  [static]
 

Returns the language type corresponding to the language ID lang_id. It is recommended that the applications work with the LanguageManager::LanguageType instead of language IDs (see LanguageManager::SetActiveLanguageType() and LanguageManager::GetActiveLanguageType()) and this method provides the mapping from the IDs to the language type.

static const PagingMap& LocaleConfig::GetPagingMap (  INT  idx  )  [static]
 

Returns:
Paging map of language with the index idx.

static const Locale::LocaleData& LocaleConfig::GetSetting (  INT  idx  )  [static]
 

Returns:
Locale setting for the index idx. Use Locale::Set(LocaleConfig::GetSetting(idx)); for assigning the setting to the system.

static INT LocaleConfig::GetSettingsCount (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Number of predefined locale settings.

static INT LocaleConfig::GetStringCount (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Number of translateable strings given by the translation table.

static const WCHAR* const* LocaleConfig::GetTranslationTable (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Translation table.
